GetFeatistics 0.3.3.6

    • Vignette of the GetFeatistics package

Transpose features table.

transpose_feat_table.Rd

Given a feature table, it transposes it, so it is more suitable for following elaborations and statistical analyses.

Usage

transpose_feat_table(feat_table, name_first_column = "samples")

Arguments

feat_table

a dataframe: first column the featname, each other column is a sample with feature intensities. Each row is a feature. It can be obtained with the get_feat_table_from_MSDial function of the present package, but ideally it underwent the cleaning with QCs using the QCs_process function.

name_first_column

character of length 1. You can specify here the name of the first column, which will be referred to the column of samples.

Value

A tibble with samples as rows and features as columns.
